name: ScrollCounter
summary: A Robinhood inspired scrolling effect for transitioning between numbers.
description: ScrollCounter animates a scrolling effect, similar to an odometer, for transitioning between numbers.  This is inspired by the way the Robinhood App animates between numbers, and can be used to replicate all of the rapidly scrolling and transitioning behaviors seen in Robinhood's app.
